subtitle: The Strider pet mod for Minecraft Dungeons
description:
This is a mod which replaces the baby chicken pet with a strider!

Available Versions

  • Strider - A regular strider as a pet
  • Baby Strider - A half resolution baby strider texture to acompany you on your travels
  • Strider Steve - It's a strider, with a steve skin. What more do you want
